alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:34PM MST until August 07 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MST FOR WESTERN COCHISE COUNTY... At 734 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dragoon to 10 miles south of Pearce-Sunsites to 6 miles north of Bisbee, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bisbee, St. David, Tombstone, Naco, Dragoon, Pearce-Sunsites and Texas Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
